base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray bin with green lid.
part_description: The bin has a green lid, gray body, and two black wheels at the bottom rear. The lid is flat and rectangular, covering the top. The body is tall and rectangular, with wheels positioned at the back for mobility.
internal_interaction_description: The green lid is hinged to the top of the gray body, allowing it to open and close for access. The wheels are attached to the lower rear corners of the body, providing support and enabling easy tilting and rolling of the bin for transportation.
external_interaction_description: The bin is designed for outdoor use, interacting with users who open the lid to deposit waste. The wheels facilitate movement across surfaces, allowing it to be positioned or emptied easily. It can be placed alongside other bins for waste segregation.
